function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in data sharing and supply chain complexity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prohibitive start-up investment costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of human-to-human transmission of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in low-carbon investments due to economic downturn","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of legal and financial support from authorities","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Innovation across multiple domains required","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vibrant local manufacturing as an enabler of resilient economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioural change in consumers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification and circularity of supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-contamination of medical accessories in factories re-purposed for different products","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in disposable medical hardware and plastic packaging","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital waste management involving non-biodegradable materials and plastics with potential for disease spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased volume of infectious waste due to covid-19 precautions in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-house transmission of the virus due to poor-quality housing and energy-inefficient homes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prevalence of poor-quality buildings and inadequate access to sanitation amenities in poorer countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of infection due to underutilised office and business spaces with insufficient ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to social distancing measures and ventilation requirements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through the reuse of materials and prefabricated components in construction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The construction industry delivering adaptable buildings in record time may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission due to the presence of multiple workers in a confined space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refurbishment and renovation activities in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not implemented","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wasteful practices and inadequate sanitation in the food sector contribute to the risk of disease transmission and foodborne illnesses, impacting public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased proximity of agricultural activities to urban areas may increase the risk of disease transmission from animals to humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased popularity of local farms and urban agriculture due to covid-19 may lead to higher levels of contamination in these settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of investment in physical infrastructure like cold chains for food storage, processing, and supply","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste food collection and volarisation infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traffic congestion and increased vehicle use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient governance mechanism for ce-related initiatives","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Facilitating a step change towards sustainable improvements in air quality may lead to increased construction activities, potentially causing airborne particle pollution and respiratory health risks for urban residents","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling up battery value chain","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of raw material supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased traffic volume and raw material demand from electric vehicles","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper implementation of digital technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security vulnerabilities in digital infrastructure","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and compliance with regulations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education, information, and awareness integration into educational curricula may hinder adoption of ce principles and lifecycle systems thinking","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate platforms for collaboration and public-private partnerships may impede the sharing of information and hinder breakthroughs in materials science and engineering","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability initiatives in public procurement and infrastructure may lead to continued reliance on non-sustainable practices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrestricted air travel contributing to the spread of pandemics, such as viral influenza types like covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution and transportation/industrialization contributing to critical issues highlighted by the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-resilience of peer-to-peer p2p or sharing economy models to global systemic shocks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in cargo shipping leading to increased airfreight costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote working and telemedicine becoming more prevalent","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in primary energy consumption due to economic slowdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare delivery systems for mass casualties and emergencies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Protectionism and in-ward looking policies on exports and tariff reductions/waivers","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in infectious hospital waste due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online purchasing leading to reduced foot traffic in small businesses, impacting their viability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of regenerative agriculture and urban agriculture leading to food insecurity","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of global value chains due to exploitation of the pandemic for sustainable growth by certain countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
